title: I-30/SH 360 Interchange Construction photos

pageHeader.title: Construction Views
pageHeader.subTitle: SH 360 Interchange, 2016-2019
pageHeader.lastUpdated: last updated Sept 29, 2021 (add photo), created June 11, 2017

text: This project adds a complete four-level interchange at this freeway intersection. The old DFW Turnpike connections have been used previously going back to the opening of the turnpike in 1957. This project began in April 2016 and was scheduled to be complete in 2021, but as of June 2021 the project is not near completion.
